snippet: Sheldon Adelson, a billionaire casino owner, and his wife, Dr. Miriam Adelson, are by far the most prolific campaign donors in the country.
abstract: Wealthy donors and corporations, in the wake of deregulation of the campaign finance system, are planning to pour hundreds of millions of dollars into the presidential and Congressional elections, mostly in support of Republicans; billionaire Sheldon Adelson has given at least $35 million to pro-Republican super PACS during the 2012 campaign, including a recent $10 million donation to presumptive GOP presidential nominee Mitt Romney.
lead_paragraph: Sheldon Adelson, a billionaire casino owner, and his wife, Dr. Miriam Adelson, are by far the most prolific campaign donors in the country.

headline.seo: Sheldon Adelson Sets New Standard as Campaign Aid Surges Into 8 Figures
headline.main: Campaign Aid Is Now Surging Into 8 Figures
